body:
Ok, so here i go. When you join a game of dtm, mix, etc., the blocks cold be in slot nine in one map, and slot 7 in another.this makes gameplay more boring because people take like 5 mins organizing their inventory just to be killed within the minute. A LOT of people get annoyed having to REORGANIZE their inventory every single map. SO, what if the map making people make it so that the inventory is the same for all games. Example(just an idea)
SLOT:
1 sword
2 bow
3 pickaxe
4 gap
5 raw wood
6 glass
7 regular food
8 whatever
9 whatever
 
There could also be an option to customize your inventor

Thanks, 

UrpleGlurp and rat







 egitserp kcab gnirb

replies.body: I think that we should be able to choose our own inventory setup in-game. For example every Destroy map has a sword, a pickaxe & a bow. We will also get food, golden apples and blocks. If we could choose which order we'd want to have them in i think it'd be a lot easier.

replies.body:
Why not just have some kind of system that allows each individual to customize their own loadout and when a map loads the server would read their custom loadout and assign a hotbar based on their preference? Kinda like how on pot servers you can customize your hotbar pre game. 

I do agree though, it is very annoying. I don't think it would be wise though to adopt one universal hotbar, it just would annoy people even more since everyone is different.
